sentences.sContent: The government denied the existence of poverty among 16- and 17-year-olds.
sentences.sCn: 政府否认十六七岁的青少年当中存在贫困问题。

sentences.sContent: ...there is simply no reason for anyone to attempt to deny her right to start anew...

synos.tran: 否定，否认；拒绝给予；拒绝…的要求

phrases.pCn: deny someone something 拒绝给予

words.tran: 可否认的；可拒绝的；可否定的

trans.tranOther: to say that something is not true, or that you do not believe something
